text: muhammadeuneun han seonjija-e bulgwahamyeo geu ijeon seonjijadeuldo sesang eul tteonassnola man-il geuga juggeona hog-eun salhaedanghandamyeon neohuineun dol-aseo gessneunyo man-yag eoneu nuga dol-aseonda hadeolado jogeumdo hananim-eul haehaji anihal geos-imyeo hananim-eun gamsahaneun jadeul-ege bosang-eul jusil geos-ila
